metadata.title: CVE-2020-23273 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Heap-buffer overflow in the randomize_iparp function in edit_packet.c. of Tcpreplay v4.3.2 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (DOS) via a crafted pcap.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-23273` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpreplay - 4.3.3-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tcpreplay package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.3-2').
